ca.ualberta.cmput301w15t13.Activities

Class ExpenseActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ca.ualberta.cmput301w15t13.Activities.ExpenseActivity

  • public class ExpenseActivity
extends Activity
    This activity is used to manage Expense Items for all claims you have permission to see, whether your own claims or submitted claims. From this activity you can also create, edit, and approve expense items which are supported by corresponding fragments. Classes it works with: ExpenseManagerFragment,ExpenseItemViewFragment, TakePictureFragment, ExpenseListViewerFragment, DataManager Sample use: Intent intent = new Intent(this, ExpenseActivity.class); startActivity(intent);
